alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 7:52PM EDT until April 09 at 5:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19 affecting Talbot, Upson, Taylor and Crawford Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Carsonville Hwy. 19...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River near Carsonville Hwy. 19. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 24 feet, Minor flooding expands further into the woodlands and fields along the river upstream and downstream from the gage on U.S. Highway 19. The flood waters will be up to 6 feet deep over the top of the boat ramp and cover a portion of the access road by the bridge on the Taylor County side of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EDT Tuesday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 23.2 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. &&
